#modmrg

A package of models in `mrgsolve` format.

## Example
```{r}
library(modmrg)

mod <- pk2cmt()

mod

param(mod)

init(mod)

mod %>%
  ev(amt=250, ii=48, addl=10) %>% 
  mrgsim(end=1000 )%>% 
  plot
```

```{r}
mod <- irm1()
see(mod)

mod %>% 
  ev(amt=750) %>% 
  Req(CP) %>%
  knobs(n=seq(1,10,1)) %>%
  plot
  
```
